trans-unit.source: This is Dr. Geoff Rutledge, the Chief Medical Officer at HealthTap. I’d like to personally offer you a benefits solution that can significantly reduce healthcare costs for your clients, deliver peace of mind for their employees, and strengthen your customer relationships. Our award-winning approach is already delighting hundreds of millions of people across the world and rapidly displacing traditional telemedicine offerings within dozens of Fortune 500 companies. Today, we are offering this proven solution to you at an unprecedented value that will help you make more money and retain your book of business.

seg-source.mrk: This is Dr. Geoff Rutledge, the Chief Medical Officer at HealthTap. I’d like to personally offer you a benefits solution that can significantly reduce healthcare costs for your clients, deliver peace of mind for their employees, and strengthen your customer relationships. Our award-winning approach is already delighting hundreds of millions of people across the world and rapidly displacing traditional telemedicine offerings within dozens of Fortune 500 companies. Today, we are offering this proven solution to you at an unprecedented value that will help you make more money and retain your book of business.

target.mrk: 这是HealthTap的首席医务官Geoff Rutledge医生。我想亲自为您提供一个福利解决方案可以显著降低您的客户的医疗成本，让他们的员工安心，并加强您的客户关系。我们的屡获殊荣的方法已经使全世界数亿人感到愉快，并迅速取代了数十家财富500强公司的传统远程医疗产品。今天，我们以一个前所未有的价值为您提供这个已经验证的解决方案，将帮助您赚更多的钱并且可以保留您的业务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a tremendous complement to traditional health insurance plans, particularly well suited for clients with high deductible plans. Our HealthTap Prime service is an affordable subscription to all of the virtual care needed by an individual (or even a family), offering unlimited access to doctor-created health information and answers to health questions, as well as immediate consultations with primary care doctors (via text, audio or video), 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, directly from any web connection, or mobile device.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap is a tremendous complement to traditional health insurance plans, particularly well suited for clients with high deductible plans. Our HealthTap Prime service is an affordable subscription to all of the virtual care needed by an individual (or even a family), offering unlimited access to doctor-created health information and answers to health questions, as well as immediate consultations with primary care doctors (via text, audio or video), 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, directly from any web connection, or mobile device.

target.mrk: HealthTap是对传统医疗保险方案的巨大弥补，特别适合具有高扣除额方案的客户。 我们的HealthTap Prime服务对所有需要在线医护的个人（或甚至一个家庭）来说是一个实惠的订购，提供无限访问医生创建的健康信息和健康问题的回答，以及立即咨询普通门诊医生的机会（通过文字，音频或视频），每天24小时，每周7天，直接从任何网络连接或移动设备。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a Silicon Valley based company that is revolutionizing healthcare by providing individuals with immediate access to personalized information and guidance from over 71,000 highly qualified U.S. doctors with over 20 years of experience on average. We are the World Economic Forum Technology Pioneer of 2015, joining the ranks of past winners like Google, Twitter, Airbnb and Uber. Other recent accolades include:

target.mrk: 我最近邀请您与HealthTap合作，为您的客户提供业界领先的在线健康医护服务，现在我希望为您提供一个新的特别定价计划，只提供给本月与我们合作的领先健康保险经纪人。请通过电子邮件将您的联系信息发送到partnerships+rutledge@healthtap.com，或者花一点时间填写此兴趣表格，合作伙伴专家将很高兴向您展示如何通过与我们合作来赚取更多收益。

trans-unit.source: For a limited time, we’re offering unlimited access subscriptions for pre-purchase at up to 75% off our standard group rate. Some of our partners are already earning more than $50,000 from just a single 100-member implementation. To find out more about partnering with us to offer this innovative and profitable program to your clients, simply tell us your phone number and a time to call. One of our partnership specialists will be delighted to show you how you can earn even more by partnering with us this month!

trans-unit.source: I’d like to invite you to become a HealthTap Benefits Partner. Boost your income, delight your clients, and grow your business by leveraging our award-winning virtual healthcare service to enhance your health-insurance offerings.

seg-source.mrk: I’d like to invite you to become a HealthTap Benefits Partner. Boost your income, delight your clients, and grow your business by leveraging our award-winning virtual healthcare service to enhance your health-insurance offerings.

target.mrk: 我希望邀请您成为HealthTap福利合作伙伴。通过利用我们屡获殊荣的在线医疗服务来提高您的健康保险产品，提高您的收入，使您的客户高兴，并发展您的业务。

trans-unit.source: Our innovative solution provides your clients with affordable access to immediate consults with top Board Certified U.S. doctors by HD video, voice, or text chat from anywhere, on any smartphone, tablet, or PC — 24/7! You can deliver meaningful ROI to your clients and peace of mind to their employees with trusted, immediate, and affordable access to doctor advice, prescriptions, diagnostics, and post-consult checklists and reminders. This service is a tremendous complement to traditional health insurance plans and particularly beneficial for clients who have high deductible plans and Health Savings Accounts.

trans-unit.source: Many heartfelt thanks for helping us spread health, happiness, and smiles to millions everywhere. We appreciate your friendship and are grateful for your support. May all the good things in life be yours in abundance :)

seg-source.mrk: Many heartfelt thanks for helping us spread health, happiness, and smiles to millions everywhere. We appreciate your friendship and are grateful for your support. May all the good things in life be yours in abundance :)

target.mrk: 非常感谢您帮助我们将健康，幸福和微笑传播给数百万人。我们感谢您的友谊并感谢您的支持。愿您的生命中充满美好的事物:)

trans-unit.source: and the HealthTap Team

seg-source.mrk: and the HealthTap Team

target.mrk: 和HealthTap团队

trans-unit.source: I’m excited to share with you that 2014 has been our best year ever, and we’re looking forward to a fabulous 2015, in which we will bring even more health, good life, and smiles to you and many millions everywhere.

seg-source.mrk: I’m excited to share with you that 2014 has been our best year ever, and we’re looking forward to a fabulous 2015, in which we will bring even more health, good life, and smiles to you and many millions everywhere.

target.mrk: 我很高兴与您分享，2014年是我们最好的一年，我们期待着一个神话般的2015年，在这一年我们将给您带来更多的健康，美好的生活和微笑，以及世界各地的数百万人。

trans-unit.source: We started the year with the deepest research and development effort we’ve ever taken on ourselves – to create the first end-to-end Virtual Care experience that will help people everywhere manage their health and well being. We aspired to support health journeys, yours and your loved ones’, from a wellness aspiration, or physical/emotional discomfort or pain, all the way to reaching a desirable health goal and to feeling good!

seg-source.mrk: We started the year with the deepest research and development effort we’ve ever taken on ourselves – to create the first end-to-end Virtual Care experience that will help people everywhere manage their health and well being. We aspired to support health journeys, yours and your loved ones’, from a wellness aspiration, or physical/emotional discomfort or pain, all the way to reaching a desirable health goal and to feeling good!

target.mrk: 我们在这一年开始对自己采取最深入的研究和开发工作 – 创建第一个端到端的在线医护体验，将帮助各地的人们管理他们的健康与保健。我们渴望支持您和您的亲人健康旅程，从健康的愿望，或身体/情绪的不适或疼痛，一直到达到理想的健康目标并感觉良好！

trans-unit.source: Working with data from hundreds of millions of people, and tens of thousands of doctors, and with numerous product iterations, we architected our proprietary path to feeling good in 3 easy steps: “Learn More”, “Get Help”, and “Take Action.” We realized that we are not in the business of just providing health information, or mere “telemedicine” or simply scheduling doctor appointments, we officially and wholeheartedly entered the business of helping people feel good!

seg-source.mrk: Working with data from hundreds of millions of people, and tens of thousands of doctors, and with numerous product iterations, we architected our proprietary path to feeling good in 3 easy steps: “Learn More”, “Get Help”, and “Take Action.” We realized that we are not in the business of just providing health information, or mere “telemedicine” or simply scheduling doctor appointments, we officially and wholeheartedly entered the business of helping people feel good!

target.mrk: 通过使用来自数亿人，数万名医生的数据，以及大量的产品迭代，我们构建了我们的感觉良好的专有路径的3个简单的步骤：“了解更多”，“获得帮助”和“采取行动”。我们意识到我们不是仅仅提供健康信息，或仅仅是”远程医疗“或只是安排医生预约，我们正式地和全心的投入帮助人们感觉良好的业务！

trans-unit.source: Simultaneously, we hired the best technical/product/design team in digital health, and one of the best in Silicon Valley, bringing together the brightest engineers with deep expertise in all frameworks and platforms (iOS, Android, Web, and wearables), and with a deep passion for innovation and helping others. We fortified the team with some of the Valley’s finest designers, data geeks, and product managers, and a fabulous customer care and Medical Expert ops team, and together, we repeatedly iterated with millions of users and tens of thousands of doctors, until we were ready to launch our new groundbreaking platform to the world.

seg-source.mrk: Simultaneously, we hired the best technical/product/design team in digital health, and one of the best in Silicon Valley, bringing together the brightest engineers with deep expertise in all frameworks and platforms (iOS, Android, Web, and wearables), and with a deep passion for innovation and helping others. We fortified the team with some of the Valley’s finest designers, data geeks, and product managers, and a fabulous customer care and Medical Expert ops team, and together, we repeatedly iterated with millions of users and tens of thousands of doctors, until we were ready to launch our new groundbreaking platform to the world.

target.mrk: 同时，我们聘请了数字健康中最好的技术/产品/设计团队，同时也是硅谷最好的团队之一，汇聚了所有框架和平台（iOS，Android，Web和可穿戴设备）里最专业的工程师，他们对创新和帮助他人有着深厚的热情。我们加强了与硅谷最好的设计师，数据极客和产品经理，以及一个神话般的客户关心和医学专家操作团队，与我们一起，反复与数以百万的用户和成千上万的医生，直到我们准备向世界推出我们的新的开创性平台。

trans-unit.source: Our doctor network and user base experienced robust growth and strong engagement throughout the year, even without a marketing budget or team. We could have become profitable at the beginning of the year by turning on display/text ads on our online/mobile pages, but we decided not to do so. Leaving “on the table” millions of dollars every month, we remained true to our mission to focus on making users healthier and happier and giving people the best experience while building the first trusted global consumer brand in digital health.

seg-source.mrk: Our doctor network and user base experienced robust growth and strong engagement throughout the year, even without a marketing budget or team. We could have become profitable at the beginning of the year by turning on display/text ads on our online/mobile pages, but we decided not to do so. Leaving “on the table” millions of dollars every month, we remained true to our mission to focus on making users healthier and happier and giving people the best experience while building the first trusted global consumer brand in digital health.

target.mrk: 我们的医生网络和用户群经历了全年的快速增长和强大的参与，即使没有营销预算或团队。 我们可以通过在我们的在线/移动页面上打开展示广告/文字广告并在年初获利，但我们决定不这样做。放弃“触手可得” 的每月数百万美元，我们坚持我们的使命注重使用户更健康，更快乐，给人们最好的体验，同时在数字健康领域中建立第一个可信的全球消费者品牌。

trans-unit.source: Committed to our mission, and to quality, in early fall we launched our first end-to-end service helping people everywhere manage their health and feel good every day. Our new basic service remains available for free, but we also introduced our first paid premium service, HealthTap Prime. This first-of-a-kind service, that was created based on the research we conducted, is premised on the three main modules of our new platform:

seg-source.mrk: Committed to our mission, and to quality, in early fall we launched our first end-to-end service helping people everywhere manage their health and feel good every day. Our new basic service remains available for free, but we also introduced our first paid premium service, HealthTap Prime. This first-of-a-kind service, that was created based on the research we conducted, is premised on the three main modules of our new platform:

target.mrk: 致力于我们的使命和质量，在初秋我们推出了我们的第一个端到端帮助世界各地的人们管理他们的健康和每一天都感觉良好的服务。我们新的基本服务仍然是免费的，但我们还介绍了我们的第一个付费的高级服务，HealthTap Prime。基于我们进行的研究创建的这种首创的服务是基于我们的新平台的三个主要模块：

trans-unit.source: Our all new HealthTap Prime, where users get unlimited doctor consults on any mobile device or personal computer 24/7 has been one of our most successful services to date, and is growing very rapidly! HealthTap Prime and our new platform received an unprecedented warm welcome in traditional and social media – attracting more than 82 original stories in print, digital, and broadcast, media (from WIRED Magazine, to Good Morning America, and from Forbes Magazine to ABC News, everyone everywhere praised our innovation and the value we’re creating for people everywhere).

seg-source.mrk: Our all new HealthTap Prime, where users get unlimited doctor consults on any mobile device or personal computer 24/7 has been one of our most successful services to date, and is growing very rapidly! HealthTap Prime and our new platform received an unprecedented warm welcome in traditional and social media – attracting more than 82 original stories in print, digital, and broadcast, media (from WIRED Magazine, to Good Morning America, and from Forbes Magazine to ABC News, everyone everywhere praised our innovation and the value we’re creating for people everywhere).

target.mrk: 我们所有新的HealthTap Prime，用户可以在任何移动设备或个人计算机上24/7全天候获得无限医生咨询是我们迄今为止最成功的服务之一，并且增长非常迅速！HealthTap Prime和我们的新平台在传统和社交媒体上获得了前所未有的热烈欢迎——吸引了在印刷，数字和广播，媒体超过82个原创故事（从连线杂志，到早安美国，从“福布斯”杂志到ABC新闻，每个人都称赞我们的创新和我们为世界各地的人创造的价值）。

trans-unit.source: To capitalize on the success of HealthTap Prime, and extend our reach to doctors everywhere, HealthTap recently launched our first nationwide Digital Health Marketplace for accessing care, providing 24/7 fast affordable access to everyone’s own doctors, as well as to doctors in 105 specialties. Our all-new HealthTap Concierge service, available in all 50 states, connects people instantaneously to their own physicians and a network of more than 1 million top doctors–anytime, anywhere. Now every doctor in the US, and eventually all over the world, who gets a license from HealthTap, can provide an end-to-end virtual care experience to their own patients anytime, anywhere from any mobile device or personal computer!

seg-source.mrk: To capitalize on the success of HealthTap Prime, and extend our reach to doctors everywhere, HealthTap recently launched our first nationwide Digital Health Marketplace for accessing care, providing 24/7 fast affordable access to everyone’s own doctors, as well as to doctors in 105 specialties. Our all-new HealthTap Concierge service, available in all 50 states, connects people instantaneously to their own physicians and a network of more than 1 million top doctors–anytime, anywhere. Now every doctor in the US, and eventually all over the world, who gets a license from HealthTap, can provide an end-to-end virtual care experience to their own patients anytime, anywhere from any mobile device or personal computer!

target.mrk: 为了充分利用HealthTap Prime的成功，并扩大我们世界各地医生的覆盖范围，HealthTap最近推出了我们第一个与健康有关的全国数字化健康市场，提供24/7全天候的快速实惠的访问每个人自己医生，以及来自105个专科的医生的服务。我们全新的HealthTap贵宾台服务，可在全部50个州，将人们立即连接到他们自己的医生和一个拥有超过100万位顶级医生的网络-- 随时随地。现在每个在美国，最终遍布世界各地的医生，从HealthTap获得执业执照，可以随时随地从任何移动设备或个人计算机向自己的患者提供端到端在线医护体验！

trans-unit.source: Finally, to welcome the promising future of wearables, we launched the first ever healthcare app on Android Wear bringing checklists, reminders and tips from HealthTap doctors to smart-watches. We’ve since continued our rigorous R&D in wearables, iterated several times, and we’re now super excited to work on another stealthy upcoming watch project, and bring real healthcare and medicine to people through wearables everywhere. We strongly believe that wearables and smart-watches will be a very important premise for everyone’s health in the future, and are committed to leading the way in healthcare in this space.

We strongly believe that wearables and smart-watches will be a very important premise for everyone’s health in the future, and are committed to leading the way in healthcare in this space.

target.mrk: 最后，为了欢迎可穿戴设备的未来，我们推出了第一个带有安卓系统的健康医护应用程序，将HealthTap医生的清单，提醒和小贴士发送到智能手表。我们已经继续了我们严谨的可穿戴设备的研发，多次更新换代，并且我们现在非常兴奋开发另一个即将到来的隐身手表项目，通过可穿戴设备随时随地带给人们真正的健康医护服务。 我们坚信可穿戴设备和智能手表将是未来关于每个人健康的非常重要的前提，而且我们致力于在这个健康医护领域取得领先地位。

trans-unit.source: After a fabulous year of deep research, development, a landmark launch, and rapid organic growth, we feel very confident for a super promising 2015. In the New Year we’re planning to take the groundbreaking platform that we’ve built, which has already proven great product-market fit and natural consumer and doctor traction, and distribute the valuable services built on it to everyone everywhere. We’re excited for a year of strong growth and even more robust engagement, where we can give access to our products and services to hundreds of millions of people everywhere. We’re thrilled about reaching these people through mobile and wearable devices, as well as via the good ol’ Web, and we’re also thrilled to partner with small, medium and large medical and healthcare practices to help doctors and highly reputable institutions provide virtual care to their own patients anytime anywhere.

seg-source.mrk: After a fabulous year of deep research, development, a landmark launch, and rapid organic growth, we feel very confident for a super promising 2015. In the New Year we’re planning to take the groundbreaking platform that we’ve built, which has already proven great product-market fit and natural consumer and doctor traction, and distribute the valuable services built on it to everyone everywhere. We’re excited for a year of strong growth and even more robust engagement, where we can give access to our products and services to hundreds of millions of people everywhere. We’re thrilled about reaching these people through mobile and wearable devices, as well as via the good ol’ Web, and we’re also thrilled to partner with small, medium and large medical and healthcare practices to help doctors and highly reputable institutions provide virtual care to their own patients anytime anywhere.

target.mrk: 经过一年的深入研究，开发，一个里程碑式的发布，以及快速的有机增长，我们对于2015年超级乐观的前景充满信心。在新的一年中，我们计划充分利用我们已经建立的开创性的并且已经展现了良好的产品市场契合度以及自然的消费者和医生配合度的平台，并将平台上有价值的服务推广到所有地区的每一个人。我们对于一个强劲的增长和更强大的参与度感到兴奋，因为我们可以为世界各地数亿人提供我们的产品和服务。 我们很高兴通过移动设备和可穿戴设备以及优质网络接触这些人，我们也非常高兴能与中小型和大型医疗和健康医护诊疗合作，帮助医生和声誉良好的机构随时随地向自己的患者提供在线医护。

trans-unit.source: For 2015, we’re getting very excited about the rapid adoption of wearable computing. We believe that there’s a huge opportunity to bring together the valuable health data that’s collected with these wearables, and help doctors make better recommendations for their patients for better courses of action via virtual consults powered by this data. Moreover, we believe that these wearables can also function as great communication devices to help our doctors not only learn about their patients, but also send patients the right signals at the right moments to close valuable feedback loops and encourage the right behaviors at the right times. We’ve already integrated Apple’s HealthKit, and Google Fit into the HealthTap experience, and we see a huge opportunity in collaborating with large and small players in the industry to make the promise of wearables and big data a valuable reality for doctors and users in 2015.

We believe that there’s a huge opportunity to bring together the valuable health data that’s collected with these wearables, and help doctors make better recommendations for their patients for better courses of action via virtual consults powered by this data. Moreover, we believe that these wearables can also function as great communication devices to help our doctors not only learn about their patients, but also send patients the right signals at the right moments to close valuable feedback loops and encourage the right behaviors at the right times. We’ve already integrated Apple’s HealthKit, and Google Fit into the HealthTap experience, and we see a huge opportunity in collaborating with large and small players in the industry to make the promise of wearables and big data a valuable reality for doctors and users in 2015.

target.mrk: 在2015年，我们对可穿戴设备的广泛使用感到非常兴奋。我们相信，我们拥有一个巨大的机会去收集与这些可穿戴设备宝贵的健康数据，并帮助医生为患者提供更好的建议，通过这些数据在线咨询更好的行动。 此外，我们相信这些可穿戴设备也可以作为伟大的通信设备，帮助我们的医生不仅了解他们的患者，而且在适当的时候给患者正确的信号以关闭宝贵的反馈回路，并在合适的时间鼓励正确的行为 。 我们已经将苹果的HealthKit和Google Fit整合到HealthTap的体验中，我们看到了与行业中的大型和小型企业合作的巨大机会，使可穿戴设备和大数据的承诺成为2015年医生和用户的有价值的现实。

trans-unit.source: There are so many exciting opportunities for us 2015, but most importantly, we’re here to serve you and your loved ones, and make everyone everywhere healthier and happier! Thanks for helping us make HealthTap an ever-better service, and for putting your trust in us – we’re always here to do more, to do better, to make sure we deserve your support and trust, and of course, to smile :) Please continue to send us your feedback and the best people you know - we’re continuing to expand and grow, and need the best ideas, and best people to make this world a healthier happier place in 2015!

target.mrk: 对于我们而言，在2015年有这么多令人兴奋的机会，但最重要的是，我们在这里为您和您所爱的人服务，让无处不在的每个人更健康，更快乐！感谢您帮助我们使HealthTap成为一个更好的服务，并且信任我们 - 我们会一直做得更多，做得更好，以确保我们值得您的支持和信任，当然，要继续保持微笑:) 请继续向我们发送您的反馈和推荐您认识的优秀的人 - 我们将不断的成长，并且我们需要最好的想法和最优秀的人，使这个世界在2015年成为更健康，更幸福的地方！

trans-unit.source: This is a followup to tell you how you can profit from an affordable healthcare service that gives your clients peace of mind during their travels. With our award-winning service, your clients will have access to 24/7 immediate medical consultations via mobile or computer from board-certified U.S. doctors any time they have a health concern, from anywhere, for less than $2/day. Earn more income today!

trans-unit.source: Doctor %{ai_serif} is a personal %{ai_serif}-powered physician trained by HealthTap’s network of more than 105,000 top doctors that uses machine learning algorithms to apply doctor-sourced clinical expertise. Dr. %{ai_serif} converses with the patient to understand their health profile to determine the possible causes of their symptoms and route users to the right care immediately.

target.mrk: ％{ai_serif}医生是由HealthTap的超过105,000名顶级医生的网络培训的个人％{ai_serif}驱动的医师，他们使用机器学习算法来应用来源与医生的临床专业知识。 ％{ai_serif}医生可以与患者交流，了解他们的健康概况，以确定其症状的可能原因，并立即将用户发送到正确的医护。
